meanings.definition: Not confined to or restricted by a particular locality or region.
meanings.sent1: The internet allows for nonlocal communication between people from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The company has nonlocal branches in various cities across the country.
meanings.sent3: The nonlocal cat wandered into the neighborhood and made friends with the local pets.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlocal knowledge of different cultures made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonlocal concept of time travel fascinated the students in the science class.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is not local or native to a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The tourist was a nonlocal who was exploring the city for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The nonlocal brought unique perspectives to the discussion due to their diverse background.
meanings.sent3: The nonlocal plant species thrived in the new environment, surprising the local botanists.
meanings.sent4: The nonlocal bird species migrating through the region added color to the skies.
meanings.sent5: The nonlocal cuisine introduced at the festival delighted the taste buds of the attendees.
